New Records: Jose Quintana extended his scoreless streak to a career-high 22 2/3 innings
Key Match Events: Brandon Nimmo’s three-run homer capped a nine-run fourth
Luisangel Acuña homered again for the Mets
Acuña homered in the eighth — his second in two nights
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: Nimmo said, ‘I’m pretty much convinced now we’re not in the regular season anymore… We’re in playoff baseball and every win is extremely important’
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets have won 15 of 19 and moved a season-high 16 games above.500
They remained tied with Arizona for the second of three NL wild cards — two games ahead of Atlanta for the league’s last playoff spot
